missions.name: Father of Time
missions.description: The leader of the mages in the great magic war. His Magical power is said to still be unrivaled even today.

missions.name: Angels Ascended
missions.description: The leader of the mortals in the great magic war. She was one of the first to wield experimental magical hybrid weaponery

missions.name: Loss of a Legend
missions.description: One of Chronos' most respected generals. He had a great hand in ending the war.

missions.name: Experimentation
missions.description: On the side of the mortals, he was responsible for building the magical hybrid weapons.

missions.name: Master of Data
missions.description: The leader of one of the most popular guilds of Vanos, called to stop an abnormal train robbery.

missions.name: Master of Speed
missions.description: A magic user from one of the most popular guilds of Vanos, called to stop an abnormal train robbery.

missions.name: Master Swordsman
missions.description: A mortal from one of the most popular teams of Vanos, called to stop an abnormal train robbery.

missions.name: First Encounters
missions.description: A train travelling through Vanos is holding valuable cargo that has attracted the wrong type of attention.

missions.name: Diplomatic Mission
missions.description: After the land of Zenith received an anonymous threat, the gang was sent to investigate.

missions.name: Leader of Zenith
missions.description: The leader of Zenith and the Chosen of the light, one of the most powerful mages in the land.

missions.name: Attack on Zenith
missions.description: A mysterious villian has laid a siege on Zenith.

missions.name: Solar Flare
missions.description: One of Cecil's most trusted generals turns out to be working for someone else.

missions.name: Dark Clown
missions.description: A powerful mage sent to eliminate the chosen of the Earth.

missions.name: Chosen of the Earth
missions.description: The chosen of the Earth seems to be met against an unpredictable foe.

missions.name: Build God then we'll talk
missions.description: The chosen of Darkness, never has met his god, has escaped captivity.

missions.name: Plan-S
missions.description: All guilds have been requested to take part in a hunt for an Rank-S Criminal.
